tit.e: Karasuma-Imadegawa (an intersection and its neighboring area at Imadegawa-cho, Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City)
Karasuma-Imadegawa (an intersection and its neighboring area at Imadegawa-cho, Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City)

sen.j: 烏丸今出川（からすまいまでがわ）は京都府京都市上京区今出川町にある交差点及びその近隣の名称。
sen.e: Karasuma-Imadegawa is the generic name of an intersection and the neighboring area of the intersection which located at Imadegawa-cho, Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Karasuma-Imadegawa is the generic name of an intersection and its neighboring area located at Imadegawa-cho, Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Karasuma-Imadegawa is the generic name of an intersection and its neighboring area located at Imadegawa-cho, Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 今出川通（京都府道101号銀閣寺宇多野線）と烏丸通（国道367号）が交わっている。
sen.e: At the intersection, Imadegawa-dori Street (Ginkakuji-Utano-sen Kyoto Prefectural Road 101) crosses with Karasuma-dori Street (National Highway 367).
At the intersection, Imadegawa-dori Street (Kyoto Prefectural Road 101 Ginkakuji-Utano Line) crosses with Karasuma-dori Street (National Route 367).
At the intersection, Imadegawa-dori Street (Kyoto Prefectural Road 101 Ginkakuji-Utano Line) crosses with Karasuma-dori Street (National Route 367).

tit.cmt: 統一リストに合わせました。

sen.e: Crossing roads and main areas the roads lead
Crossing roads and main areas the roads lead
Crossing roads and main areas the roads lead

sen.j: ↑北烏丸通（国道367号）烏丸北大路・大原 (京都市)
sen.e: To the north: Karasuma-dori Street (National Highway 367) leads to Karasuma-Kita-oji and Ohara (Kyoto City).
To the north: Karasuma-dori Street (National Route 367) leads to Karasuma-Kitaoji and Ohara (Kyoto City).
To the north: Karasuma-dori Street (National Route 367) leads to Karasuma-Kitaoji and Ohara (Kyoto City).

sen.j: →東今出川通（京都府道101号銀閣寺宇多野線）出町柳・百万遍交差点・銀閣寺道
sen.e: To the east: Imadegawa-dori Street (Ginkakuji-Utano-sen Kyoto Prefectural Road 101) leads to Demachiyanagi, Hyakumanben Intersection and Ginkakuji-dori Street.
To the east: Imadegawa-dori Street (Kyoto Prefectural Road 101 Ginkakuji-Utano Line) leads to Demachiyanagi, Hyakumanben Intersection and Ginkakuji-dori Street.
To the east: Imadegawa-dori Street (Kyoto Prefectural Road 101 Ginkakuji-Utano Line) leads to Demachiyanagi, Hyakumanben Intersection and Ginkakuji-dori Street.

sen.j: ↓南烏丸通り（国道367号）烏丸五条・奈良市
sen.e: To the south: Karasuma-dori Street (National Highway 367) leads to Karasuma-Gojo and Nara City.
To the south: Karasuma-dori Street (National Route 367) leads to Karasuma-Gojo and Nara City.
To the south: Karasuma-dori Street (National Route 367) leads to Karasuma-Gojo and Nara City.

sen.j: ←西今出川通り（京都府道101号銀閣寺宇多野線）千本今出川・北野白梅町
sen.e: To the west: Imadegawa-dori Street (Ginkakuji-Utano-sen Kyoto Prefectural Road 101) leads to Senbon-Imadegawa and Kitano-Hakubai-cho.
To the west: Imadegawa-dori Street (Kyoto Prefectural Road 101 Ginkakuji-Utano Line) leads to Senbon-Imadegawa and Kitano-Hakubai-cho.
To the west: Imadegawa-dori Street (Kyoto Prefectural Road 101 Ginkakuji-Utano Line) leads to Senbon-Imadegawa and Kitano-Hakubai-cho.

sen.j: なお、道路標識では烏丸通、今出川通に「り」を送るが、京都市内の通り名は通常この「り」を送らない。
sen.e: On traffic signs, Karasuma-dori Street and Imadegawa-dori Street are written as '烏丸通り' and '今出川通り', however, when the streets '通り (tori or dori)' in Kyoto City are written, 'り' is usually omitted, such as '烏丸通' and '今出川通' ('通り' and '通' have the same meaning and the same pronunciation).

On traffic signs, Karasuma-dori Street and Imadegawa-dori Street are written as '烏丸通り' and '今出川通り' respectively, however, for the name of streets (tori or dori in Japanese) in Kyoto City, 'ri' (り) are usually omitted, such as '烏丸通' and '今出川通' respectively('通り' and '通' have the same meaning and the same pronunciation).
sen.cmt: 半角にし、表現を変えました。
sen.e: On traffic signs, Karasuma-dori Street and Imadegawa-dori Street are written as '烏丸通り' and '今出川通り' respectively, however, for the name of streets (tori or dori in Japanese) in Kyoto City, 'ri' (り) are usually omitted, such as '烏丸通' and '今出川通' respectively('通り' and '通' have the same meaning and the same pronunciation).

sen.j: 交差点南東側は京都御所。
sen.e: To the southeast of the intersection lies Kyoto Gosho (Kyoto Imperial Palace).
To the southeast of the intersection lies Kyoto Gosho (Kyoto Imperial Palace).
To the southeast of the intersection lies Kyoto Gosho (Kyoto Imperial Palace).

sen.j: 交差点北東側に同志社大学・同志社女子大学今出川キャンパスが立地しており、学生街としての色合いが強い。
sen.e: To the northeast of the intersection lies Doshisha University and Imadegawa Campus of Doshisha Women's College of Liberal Arts, and many students and teachers are found in the area.
sen.cmt: *学生街がくせいがいIn Japan, near universities, there isn’t any academic atmosphere or closed mood or specific facility (or even café/pub/mahjong spot for students). We just find many young people walking between stations and campuses.
sen.e: To the northeast of the intersection lies Doshisha University and Imadegawa Campus of Doshisha Women's College of Liberal Arts, and many students and teachers are found in the area.
To the northeast of the intersection lies Doshisha University and the Imadegawa Campus of Doshisha Women's College of Liberal Arts, creating the atmosphere of a students' quarter.

sen.j: そのため学生向けの食堂も多く出店している。
sen.e: Many low-priced restaurants for the students are also found along the streets.
Many restaurants for the students are also found along the streets.
Many restaurants for the students are also found along the streets.

sen.j: また上京区総合庁舎、京都御所などに近いことから人通りは多い。
sen.e: Besides, as it is near Kamigyo Ward Office and Kyoto Gosho, around the intersection is quite busy.
Besides, it is a busy intersection as Kamigyo Ward Office and Kyoto Gosho and so on are nearby.
Besides, it is a busy intersection as Kamigyo Ward Office and Kyoto Gosho and so on are nearby.

sen.j: 交差点直下やや北寄りに京都市営地下鉄烏丸線 今出川駅がある。
sen.e: To the immediate north of the intersection lies Imadegawa Station of Kyoto City Subway Karasuma-sen Line.
Imadegawa Station of Kyoto City Subway Karasuma Line is located immediately below or a little bit to the north of the intersection.
Imadegawa Station of Kyoto City Subway Karasuma Line is located immediately below or a little bit to the north of the intersection.

sen.j: なお、そのほかの周辺施設は今出川駅駅周辺を参照。
sen.e: Refer to 'neighborhood of Imadegawa Station' for other facilities near the intersection.
Refer to the article of 'Neighborhood of Imadegawa Station' for other facilities near the intersection.
Refer to the article of 'Neighborhood of Imadegawa Station' for other facilities near the intersection.
